name: Tower of Origin2-Worm's Nest
description:
If you want to talk to me , please follow this twitter

The patch is also at the top of the tweet
I made this by myself. Frankly , there are many shortcomings. I sincerely ask for your forgiveness, thanks very much


The story connects the end of the generation, HongYe back to the residence, She wanted to live a normal life, but unconsciously into a greater crisis. This time she encounters a new race-Zerg, While encountering danger, she also gained more powerful abilities. To obey the Zerg, or to help humans, evento be fed up with being pushed around. Write your own story.




  • This is a traditional rpg gam
  • Contains multiple maps and a great story enough to play for several hours
  • Support simplified Chinese, English, traditional Chinese
  • Turn-Based Combat
  • Depending on your choice leads to different endings
